participant_1.background:
I got fired from my job for speaking my mind too much.
i love going to concerts and dancing hard.
I took medication to help with my dust allergy so I could write my book.
I'm a young person who doesn't want to continue my family's business.
i love creating new recipes.

participant_2.background:
I love reading about different cultures and their food, so my favorite food is always changing.
I am afraid that I will lose my ability to enjoy nature or technology.
I am prone to spending hours researching random topics online.
my best friend is gay.
i work as a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do?
I like reading about different cultures and their food, so my favorite food is always changing!
Interesting! I love to create new recipes and I love going to concerts and dancing hard!
What have you been creating recently? What kind of music do you like?
I recently made a new pasta dish with fresh ingredients and I love all types of music. I especially love going to concerts to see live music and dance!
That sounds so nice! I wish I had more time to cook. I love going to concerts too, but I'm always too busy working. I work as a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town.
Well, I'm glad you have a job that you enjoy! I recently got fired from my job for speaking my mind too much.
Oh no! That's terrible. I'm so sorry to hear that.
Thanks. It's been a tough time, but I'm trying to stay positive.
That's great. I know you'll get through this! You seem like a really strong person.
No problem! We should hang out sometime! I'd love to hear more about your cooking and your favorite concerts!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'd love to hang out too.
Great! Let's exchange numbers and we can figure out a time to get together.
